about_the_game:
Pitty Meaty is a terrifying creepypasta survival horror game in which players face horror and fear while exploring a dark forest. In this game, you must survive in a dangerous area where the foul presence of a swollen corpse head rises above the tallest trees. You need to collect ammo and notes to uncover the mystery hidden in this grim forest. Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of horror where every step could be your last.



Key Features:
  • Dangerous Territory: Explore a forest filled with dangers and hidden threats, trying to survive in a constant state of fear.
  • Menacing Atmosphere: Feel the oppressive presence of the gigantic corpse head, which heightens tension and fear with every step.
  • Resource Gathering: Search for ammo and collect notes to have a chance at survival and unraveling the mystery.
  • Dark Forest Mystery: Uncover the secret hidden within this grim place by gathering and analyzing found clues.
  • Survival Horror: Immerse yourself in the survival horror genre with its characteristic elements – limited resources, unexpected threats, and the need for constant vigilance.
